description.narrative:
Platform Impact was founded in 2019, Platform Impact empowers purpose driven entrepreneurs with knowledge, networks and capital. Platform Impact is a community of social venture builders, impact investment specialists, public private partnership professionals andinternational cooperation practitioners who take action to be long-term value-added partner for ambitious growth stage companies tackling pressing societal challenges in Cambodia with innovative or system changing business models. Platform Impact’s current ClientPortfolio is valued US$ 200 million, with 6 major impact Enterprises, 18 key global and local partner organizations, and capital needs of US$ 40 million in equities, loans and grants. All together Platform Impact’s Team combines 15+ years of experience in development organizations,
Roles of Platform Impact in this project: Platform Impact [Thought Leadership, Program Strategic Planning and Partnership Management]: - Ensure the thought leadership in the areas of impact-Driven Entrepreneurship, Shared Value and Impact Investing - Be accountable for coherence, quality and successful achievement of the strategic goals of the Program - Define the resource(human, financial, and materials) needed to run the program - Design the curriculum and structure of the Impact Catalyst Program - Plan the strategy to ensure high quality support to Entrepreneurs through 1-on-1 coaching, advisory services, workshops and retreats - Integrate cutting edge tools, methodologies and concepts into the Impact Catalyst program and curriculum to ensure that the program can evolve and respond nimbly to meet the needs of entrepreneurs and investors - Identify and work closely with the right Partners to develop high quality content for the Entrepreneurs during the Program Weeks consisting of Workshops, Mentoring and Masterclasses Sessions - Create and implement strategic plans to ensure the financial self-sustainability of the Impact Catalyst Program - Develop, strengthen and maintain strategic partnerships that will enhance the Catalyst Program - Oversee the operating and grant budgets,tracking spending, and the contracts process - Control the Program costs, minimize the deviation from the budget and ensure that the project is operating within the approved budget - Ensure the Program continuously adds value to all stakeholders incl. Donors, Entrepreneurs and Impact Investors - Manage Partners’ expectations to assure their relentless commitment

participating-org.narrative:
The organization is registered in Cambodia Platform Impact specialist’s Co., Ltd.is established as a Private Limited Company under the commercial laws of the Kingdom of Cambodia. Please find enclosed Platform Impact specialist’s Co., Ltd.’s: • Certificate of Incorporation • Tax Registration Card • 2019 Patent Tax - Goal, Vision, mission and value
Scaling economic, environmental and social impacts made by passionate and talented entrepreneurs with the capacity to lead on new directions in the sectors in which they operate. After working with International Development Organizations and the Private Sector in Asia for near twenty years our founders met in Cambodia. Passionate about the region and its people, they consistently confronted the challenge of “how to empower impact-driven enterprises to work hand in hand with local vulnerable communities, ensuring positive social and economic footprints and scale”.
Werealized that many impact-driven enterprises struggled to nurture a relationship withthe right investors or to draw complementary expertise into their core team. As a result, they were often unable to establish business models that would address complex and systemic issues encountered on the path to scale and success.
Paradoxically, investor appetite for impact investing and expertise in positive social development has never been stronger.
PLATFORM’ s unique approach combines development sector expertise and business acumen, with an in-depth understanding of sustainable finance andimpact investment markets.
System dynamic modelling allows us to go in depth in analysis and ensure that our projects are designed to deliver maximum benefits for our clients and the local communitiesthey serve. Our local and regional peer networks assist our clients building innovative partnerships across the private and public sectors.
In addition, we design and implement innovative impact measurement systems to track results for our clients in a transparent and highly reliable way.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
